mapper.insert: insert into customer_tb(id, name, password, birth, gender, phone_no, job, address, email_id, email_domain, digital_edu, interest,age ) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phoneNo}, #{job}, #{address}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, #{digitalEdu}, #{interest}, #{age} )
mapper.select: select name,id,password,birth,gender,phone_no,job,address,email_id, email_domain,digital_edu,interest,age,type,customer_type from customer_tb order by name desc
